name: CatMouse vs. MouseBoard
description:
A literal game of cat and mouse just got personal! Grab a friend and pick between a Cat controlled with a mouse or a Mouse controlled with a keyboard. Cats try to catch the Mouse with a dramatic swipe, while the Mouse uses a series of doors to evade the Cat for 60 seconds. Good luck to you both! 

Controls 

Cat

Movement: mouse (the one connected to your computer) 

Left Click: Swipe at Mouse (the one that's connected to your friend) 

Right Click: Meow 

Mouse 

QWERTY: Move to that door (each door is single use, so use wisely!)
